scripts.package: npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm prune --production && rsync -avrq ./node_modules ./dist && npm run include-solution-utils && npm run package:zip
scripts.include-solution-utils: npm run solution-utils:prep && npm run solution-utils:package
scripts.solution-utils:package: cd ../solution-utils && npm run package && cd dist/ && rsync -avrq . ../../$npm_package_name/dist/solution-utils/ && cd ../../$npm_package_name
